745910.name: Game Tengoku - Clarice
745910.description:
Clarice, the heroine of Jaleco's City Connection/Cruisin, flies (drives?) into action with this DLC.

Contents

Her ClariceCar has a wide firing range and mid-level power, making it great for beginners and her charge shot unleashes a stream of fire from twin gatlings, housed somewhere in her diminuitive craft.

Hoping to beat off Momoko, her own bomber, the "Ultra Explosive ClariceBomber", features a pin-up image of herself.
The pin-up illustrations are provided by well known Japanese illustrators A-10, Riki (8-BIT MUSIC POWER), and Poyon Rock (Bakemonogatari, Bullet Soul).
And blast away to the exclusive remix track in Time Attack Mode (BGM Type > Classic Type)!

Clarice can be used in Arcade Mode + and scores using her can be recorded in the on-line leaderboards.
The DLC also adds a new page to the Data Mode HD library where you can look at flyers, screenshots and other documents related to City Connection while listening to commentary by the game's characters.

Character Profile

Clarice (voice: Sakura Tange)

The heroine of Jaleco's 1985 classic game, City Connection, or Cruisin, as it was known in English. She travels the world in her beloved ClariceCar looking for the man of her dreams.
745910.supported_languages:
日语*, 英语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
